Package managers

Class SceneManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • managers.SceneManager
  • public class SceneManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A Singleton class for managing scene routing and navigation.
    Since:
    1.0

      • goToScene

        public void goToScene​(java.lang.String fxml,
                      int customerId)
        Navigates to a scene with customer data.
        Parameters:
        fxml - The path to the scene file.
        customerId - The id of the customer being modified or scheduled.

      • goToScene

        public void goToScene​(java.lang.String fxml,
                      int customerId,
                      int appointmentId)
        Navigates to a scene with customer and appointment data.
        Parameters:
        fxml - The path to the scene file.
        customerId - The id of the customer being modified or scheduled.
        appointmentId - THe id of the appointment being modified or scheduled.
